AIXPertEntry.name: prereqnontcb
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for non-TCB: Checks whether the system is non-TCB or not.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqlft
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for LFT: Checks whether LFT is configured or not.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqcde
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for CDE: Checks whether CDE entry exists in /etc/inittab or not.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqbinaudit
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for binaudit: Checks for available disk space to enable audit.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqTE
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for Trusted Execution: Checks whether the system has Trusted Execution feature on or not.

AIXPertEntry.name: nercv5_dislpd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements NERC Standard CIP-007-5 R1.1: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable lpd daemon: Stops lpd daemon and comments the lpd entry in /etc/inittab.

AIXPertEntry.name: nercv5_discde
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements NERC Standard CIP-007-5 R1.1: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable CDE: Disables CDE when LFT is not configured.

AIXPertEntry.name: nercv5_distimedmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements NERC Standard CIP-007-5 R1.1: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable timed daemon: Stops timed daemon and comments it's entry in /etc/rc.tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: nercv5_disntpdmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements NERC Standard CIP-007-5 R1.1: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable NTP daemon: Stops NTP daemon and comments it's entry in /etc/rc.tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: nercv5_disrwhoddmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements NERC Standard CIP-007-5 R1.1: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable rwhod daemon: Stops rwhod daemon and comments it's entry in /etc/rc.tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: nercv5_disdpid2dmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements NERC Standard CIP-007-5 R1.1: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable DPID2 daemon: Stops DPID2 daemon and comments it's entry in /etc/rc.tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: nercv5_disdhcpagent
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements NERC Standard CIP-007-5 R1.1: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable DHCP Agent: Stops DHCP relay agent and comments it's entry in /etc/rc.tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: nercv5_shell
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements NERC Standard CIP-007-5 R1.1: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable rshd daemon: Comments the entry for rshd daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of rshd.

AIXPertEntry.name: nercv5_rlogin
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements NERC Standard CIP-007-5 R1.1: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable rlogind: Comments the entry for rlogind daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of rlogind.

AIXPertEntry.name: nercv5_rexecd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements NERC Standard CIP-007-5 R1.1: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable rexecd: Comments the entry for rexecd daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of rexecd.

AIXPertEntry.name: nercv5_comsat
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements NERC Standard CIP-007-5 R1.1: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable comsat: Comments the entry for comsat daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of comsat.

AIXPertEntry.name: nercv5_fingerd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements NERC Standard CIP-007-5 R1.1: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable fingerd: Comments the entry for fingerd daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of fingerd.

AIXPertEntry.name: nercv5_systat
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements NERC Standard CIP-007-5 R1.1: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable systat: Comments the entry for systat daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of systat.

AIXPertEntry.name: nercv5_tftp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements NERC Standard CIP-007-5 R1.1: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable tftpd: Comments the entry for tftpd daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of tftpd.

AIXPertEntry.name: nercv5_talk
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements NERC Standard CIP-007-5 R1.1: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable talkd: Comments the entry for talkd daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of talkd.

AIXPertEntry.name: nercv5_ntalk
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements NERC Standard CIP-007-5 R1.1: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable talkd: Comments the entry for talkd daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of talkd.

AIXPertEntry.name: nercv5_rquotad
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements NERC Standard CIP-007-5 R1.1: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable rquotad: Comments the entry for rquotad daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of rquotad.

AIXPertEntry.name: nercv5_rstatd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements NERC Standard CIP-007-5 R1.1: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable rstatd: Comments the entry for rstatd daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of rstatd.

AIXPertEntry.name: nercv5_rusersd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements NERC Standard CIP-007-5 R1.1: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable rusersd: Comments the entry for rusersd daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of rusersd.

AIXPertEntry.name: nercv5_rwalld
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements NERC Standard CIP-007-5 R1.1: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable rwalld: Comments the entry for rwalld daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of rwalld.

AIXPertEntry.name: nercv5_sprayd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements NERC Standard CIP-007-5 R1.1: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable sprayd: Comments the entry for sprayd daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of sprayd.

AIXPertEntry.name: nercv5_pcnfsd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements NERC Standard CIP-007-5 R1.1: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable pcnfsd: Comments the entry for pcnfsd daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of pcnfsd.

AIXPertEntry.name: nercv5_tcpecho
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements NERC Standard CIP-007-5 R1.1: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable TCP echo service: Comments the entry for TCP echo service in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of echo(tcp).

AIXPertEntry.name: nercv5_tcpdiscard
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements NERC Standard CIP-007-5 R1.1: Disable UNnecessary and insecure services: Disable TCP discard service: Comments the entry for TCP discard service in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of discard(tcp).

AIXPertEntry.name: nercv5_tcpchargen
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements NERC Standard CIP-007-5 R1.1: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable TCP chargen service: Comments the entry for TCP chargen service in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of chargen(tcp).

AIXPertEntry.name: nercv5_tcpdaytime
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements NERC Standard CIP-007-5 R1.1: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable TCP daytime service: Comments the entry for TCP daytime service in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of daytime(tcp).

AIXPertEntry.name: nercv5_tcptime
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements NERC Standard CIP-007-5 R1.1: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable TCP time service: Comments the entry for TCP time service in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of timed(tcp).

AIXPertEntry.name: nercv5_udpecho
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements NERC Standard CIP-007-5 R1.1: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable UDP echo service: Comments the entry for UDP echo service in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of echo(udp).

AIXPertEntry.name: nercv5_udpdiscard
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements NERC Standard CIP-007-5 R1.1: Disable unnecessary and insecure services. Disable UDP discard service: Comments the entry for UDP discard service in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of discard(udp).

AIXPertEntry.name: nercv5_udpchargen
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements NERC Standard CIP-007-5 R1.1: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable UDP chargen service: Comments the entry for UDP chargen service in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of chargen(udp).

AIXPertEntry.name: nercv5_udpdaytime
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements NERC Standard CIP-007-5 R1.1: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable UDP daytime service: Comments the entry for UDP daytime service in /etc/inetd.conf and stops the daytime(udp) service.

AIXPertEntry.name: nercv5_udptime
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements NERC Standard CIP-007-5 R1.1: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable UDP time service: Comments the entry for UDP time service in /etc/inetd.conf and stops the time(udp) service.

AIXPertEntry.name: nercv5_ftp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements NERC Standard CIP-007-5 R1.1: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable ftpd: Comments the entry for ftpd daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and stops ftpd daemon.

AIXPertEntry.name: nercv5_telnet
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements NERC Standard CIP-007-5 R1.1: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable telnetd: Comments the entry for telnetd daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and stops telnetd daemon.

AIXPertEntry.name: nercv5_dtspc
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements NERC Standard CIP-007-5 R1.1: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable dtspcd: Comments the entry for dtspcd daemon in /etc/inetd.conf when LFT is not configured and CDE is disabled in /etc/inittab.

AIXPertEntry.name: nercv5_ttdbserver
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements NERC Standard CIP-007-5 R1.1: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable ttdbserver service: Comments the entry for ttdbserver service in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of ttdbserver service.

AIXPertEntry.name: nercv5_cmsd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements NERC Standard CIP-007-5 R1.1: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable cmsd service: Comments the entry for cmsd service in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of cmsd service.

AIXPertEntry.name: nercv5_tcptr
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements NERC Standard CIP-007-5 R1.1: TCP Traffic Regulation High: Enforces denial-of-service mitigation on popular ports.

AIXPertEntry.name: nercv5_tncmsg
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements NERC Standard CIP-007-5 R2.1: Display a message to enable Trusted Network Connect (TNC).

AIXPertEntry.name: nercv5_sysintegrity
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements NERC Standard CIP-007-5 R3.3: Maintaining the system integrity by detecting removing and protecting against known types of malicious software.

AIXPertEntry.name: nercv5_pciaudit
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements NERC Standard CIP-007-5 R4.4: Enable audit: Enables bin auditing.

AIXPertEntry.name: nercv5_minlen
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements NERC Standard CIP-007-5 R5.5.1: Minimum length for password: Specifies the minimum length of password to 6 characters.

AIXPertEntry.name: nercv5_minalpha
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements NERC Standard CIP-007-5 R5.5.2: Minimum number of alphabetic chars: Specifies the minimum number of alphabetic characters in a password to 1 to ensure that the password contains alphabetic characters.

AIXPertEntry.name: nercv5_mindigit
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements NERC Standard CIP-007-5 R5.5.2: Minimum number of digits: Specifies the minimum number of digits in a password to 1 to ensure that the password contains digits.

AIXPertEntry.name: nercv5_minspecial
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements NERC Standard CIP-007-5 R5.5.2: Minimum number of special chars: Specifies the minimum number of special characters in a password to 1 to ensure that the password contains special characters.

AIXPertEntry.name: nercv5_minother
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements NERC Standard CIP-007-5 R5.5.2: Minimum number of non-alphabetic characters: Specifies the minimum number of non-alphabetic characters in a password to 2.

AIXPertEntry.name: nercv5_maxage
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements NERC Standard CIP-007-5 R5.6: Maximum age for password: Specifies the maximum number of weeks (52 weeks, at least annually) that a password is valid.

AIXPertEntry.name: nercv5_loginretries
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements NERC Standard CIP-007-5 R5.7: Number of login attempts before locking the account: Specifies the number of consecutive unsuccessful login attempts to 6 for each non-root user account before the account is disabled.

AIXPertEntry.name: nercv5_rtcmsg
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements NERC Standard CIP-010-2 R2.1: Display a message to enable Real Time Compliance (RTC).
